text: "Lesotho Fatse La Bontata Rona" (; "Lesotho, Land of Our Fathers") is the national anthem of Lesotho. ==Lyrics== Sesotho lyrics IPA transcription English translation I Lesotho, land of our Fathers, Among the lands she is the most beautiful. She is where we were born, She is where we grew up, We love her. II God, please protect Lesotho. Spare it conflict and tribulation, Oh, this land, Land of our Fathers, May it have peace. ==References== Category:African anthems Category:National symbols of Lesotho
title: Lesotho Fatse La Bontata Rona
